Details

Totem. Cracked frescoes. Semaphore. Gilt initials. Off duty. Warm pavement. Ripped chinos. Mazari palms. Osprey. Paradisical flaws. Warrant holder. Sine qua non. Of the coast. Nepenthe. Test match. Research centre. Sunken flagship. Lost league. Petrified prep. Western wakewear.
